titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Wade v. Miller, et al.
A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Wade v. Miller, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the 95 current and former Senators named as defendants in the case of Wade v. Miller, et al.
